attributes.action: Award Pascal Soriot of AstraZeneca an Honorary Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: The Government should show that the British people are thankful for all the effort he has done in helping and showing us away out of this terrible situation.  It would also demonstrate its support to all the Regulatory Authorities the we as a nation support the Oxford Vaccine
attributes.background: Mr Soriot has gone beyond his duty as a CEO of a company to help the public of not just of the UK but of the world in producing a vaccine to counter act COVID 19. Nobody has done more for this country than Mr Soriot and had nothing in return other than ridicule from countries he is trying to help.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
